module.exports = {
  validateArgs: {
    paths: {
        '/foo/{path1}': {
            get: {
                parameters: [
                    {
                        in: 'path',
                        name: 'path1',
                        type: 'string',
                        required: true,
                    },
                    {
                        in: 'query',
                        name: 'foo',
                        type: 'string',
                        required: true,
                    },
                ],
            }
        }
    },
  },
  request: {
    path: '/foo/asdf?',
    route: 'foo/{path1}',
    query: {}
  },
  expectedErrors: [
    {
        status: 400,
        code: 'Validation-required-query-parameter',
        source: { parameter: 'foo' },
        title: "The query parameter is required."
    }
  ],
};
